p: Many of the informants criticized the farming practices applied on the island. The use of chemical pesticides in agriculture was also pointed out as a major polluting factor and contributor towards less availability of WMPs. Notably, for Matricaria chamomilla, Malva sylvestris, poppy species ( Papaver dubium L., Papaver rhoeas L.) wild leafy greens like Sinapis arvensis subsp. arvensis, Sinapis alba L., and Raphanus raphanistrum L., as these are commonly harvested in flatlands, within or between cultivated fields.
